alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 2:47PM MST until January 01 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM FRIDAY TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 and 11000 Feet County. * WHEN...From 5 PM Friday to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft
